sentences.sContent: What would your refrigerator say if it could talk?
sentences.sContent_eng: What would your refrigerator say if it could talk?
sentences.sCn: 如果你的冰箱可以说话，它会说什么?。

sentences.sContent: And yet, I despise your world, I hate your carpet and your refrigerator.
sentences.sContent_eng: And yet, I despise your world, I hate your carpet and your refrigerator.
sentences.sCn: 还有，我对你的世界充满鄙视。我恨你的地毯，你的冰箱。

sentences.sContent: Elizabeth:Do you mean to tell me you have all of those drinks in your refrigerator?
sentences.sContent_eng: Elizabeth:Do you mean to tell me you have all of those drinks in your refrigerator?
sentences.sCn: 伊丽莎白：你的意思是告诉我你在冰箱里有所有的饮料? ?。

phrases.pCn: 吸收式冷冻机；吸收式冰箱

words.tran: 冷藏（refrigerate的过去分词）；使冷却
冷藏，冷冻；使冷却；使清凉

trans.tranOther: a large piece of electrical kitchen equipment, shaped like a cupboard, used for keeping food and drink cool
